Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player_board.storage

Class Storage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<Message<ClientController>>
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player_board.storage.Storage
Direct Known Subclasses:
Strongbox, Warehouse
public abstract class Storage
extends Observable<Message<ClientController>>
Abstract class that models a generic storage of resources. Observable by a controller to monitor changes.
